summary: Tested new Seasonal/Event Challenges feature. Fixed 2 bugs: 1) Frontend type badge showed 'Monthly' for seasonal challenges (fixed to show 'Seasonal'), 2) Backend challenge detail and join endpoints only searched regular challenges, not seasonal (fixed to search both). All 8 backend tests pass. Frontend correctly displays Seasonal Events section with pink header and LIMITED TIME badge.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Frontend type badge for seasonal challenges was showing 'Monthly' instead of 'Seasonal' in challenges.tsx line ~224-228
Fixed: Backend GET /api/challenges/{id} only searched CHALLENGE_DEFINITIONS, not SEASONAL_CHALLENGES - seasonal challenges returned 404
Fixed: Backend POST /api/challenges/{id}/join had same issue - couldn't join seasonal challenges
seed_data_creation: Created test user seasonal_test_user@example.com who joined Valentine's Special challenge
context_for_next_testing_agent: Seasonal Challenges feature fully functional. 8 seasonal challenges defined (Valentine's Feb 1-14, Spring Refresh Mar 20-Apr 20, Summer Deals Jun 21-Jul 31, Back to School Aug 15-Sep 15, Halloween Oct 15-31, Black Friday Nov 20-30, Holiday Gift Giver Dec 1-25, New Year Fresh Start Jan 1-15). Valentine's Special is currently active (Feb 11, 2026). Frontend shows Seasonal Events section at top with pink header, LIMITED TIME badge, and Seasonal type badge on cards. Challenge detail modal works with leaderboard.

backend_api_endpoints: GET /api/challenges - Returns active seasonal challenges with type='seasonal' ✓
GET /api/challenges/{id} - Returns detail for seasonal challenges (fixed) ✓
frontend_pages: /challenges - Displays Seasonal Events section with pink header ✓
LIMITED TIME badge on section header ✓
Valentine's Special card with heart icon, 'Seasonal' type badge ✓
Challenge detail modal with Badge Reward and Leaderboard ✓

bugs_fixed.issue: Type badge only handled 'weekly' and 'monthly', defaulted seasonal to 'Monthly'
bugs_fixed.fix: Added conditional for 'seasonal' type to show pink badge with 'Seasonal' text
